name: Remote Firmware Update
summary: Learn about .RFU files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Find the current firmware version installed on the product.
Go to the HP website, find the most current firmware, and download it.
Download the firmware to the appropriate product.
Reasons the firmware update may fail:
Corrupt RFU file: Product recognizes that the RFU file is corrupted and negates the update.
Wrong product is enclosed in the RFU file: Product recognizes the mismatch and rejects update.
Flash hardware failure: Product hardware failure.
NOTE: Before installing, read the README file that came with the RFU file for important instructions.
